sentences.en: Commander Rahm arrives, swinging a swagger stick.
sentences.cn: 拉姆司令官挥舞着一柄短手杖来到了.

sentences.en: Daddy - o. You've got the swagger a champion . Too bad for you.
sentences.cn: 噢, 妈呀,你像冠军一样得意,对你来说太糟糕了.

sentences.en: Don't swagger especially when you are in a good condition.
sentences.cn: 不要太得意,尤其是在你处于优势的时候.

sentences.en: He emerged with a macho swagger.
sentences.cn: 他大摇大摆地走了出来.
他趾高气扬地向我走来。

sentences.en: He tried not to look at them and to approximate the swagger with which they walked.
sentences.cn: 他尽量不去看他们,努力模仿他们走路时的那种大摇大摆的样子.

sentences.en: He walked down the street with a swagger.
sentences.cn: 他沿着街昂首阔步地走着.

sentences.en: He walked with something of a swagger.
His eye was alight, his color coppery, his air swagger, devil - may - care, bacchanal.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛发亮,面发铜色, 态度傲慢,不顾一切地发着酒疯.

sentences.en: Indeed, Romona did look like those figures of sex and swagger.
sentences.cn: 的确, 雷蒙看起来很象那种性感十足的轻佻的人.

sentences.en: It's of no help to you if you swagger before me.
sentences.cn: 在我面前自吹自擂对你并没什么好处.

sentences.en: Let my nephew and Goldthred swagger about their wager as they list.
sentences.cn: 让我外甥和戈德斯雷德去信口开河地打赌,随他们的便吧.

sentences.en: She went away with a swagger, and probably won't come back.
sentences.cn: 她扬鞭而去, 估计是不会回来了.

sentences.en: Swagger: You don't understand how serious this is. They killed my dog.
sentences.cn: 你不明白现在情况有多严峻. 他们杀死了我的狗.

sentences.en: The successes of corporate Korea are being matched a new diplomatic swagger.
sentences.cn: 与韩国企业的成功相呼应的是外交上的扬眉吐气.

sentences.en: They've got a swagger, but their swagger is nowhere close to ours.
sentences.cn: 他们的进攻大开大合, 但是他们的进攻离我们那支湖人队还有差距.

words.tran_cn: 吹牛；流浪汉；狂妄自大者
吹牛；昂首阔步；虚张声势吓人
吹牛；神气活现；昂首阔步（swagger的现在分词）
大摇大摆；吹牛；威吓；下摆散开状的女式短大衣
吓唬；趾高气扬地行走或行事

trans.tran_en: to walk proudly, swinging your shoulders in a way that shows you are very confident – used to show disapproval
